entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Additional Contacts properties #12797
  • Ground Overlays in NET MAUI Maps #12795
  • Android - Soft Keyboard - AdjustPan - Page does not un-pan when keyboard is closed #12793
  • Bound property does not update UI #12790
  • MAUI app build on long path not working #12777
  • MAUI cannot get the length of the stream from FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync on Android #12776
  • Rollback JSON file links are not accessible #12772
  • Hiding Entry underline inside compile directive does not work #12771
  • Fail to Install App on iOS Simulator 'Could not load the framework DVItunesSoftwareServiceFoundation' #12770
  • [Blazor] Optimize IPC channel for Blazor Desktop #12767
  • OnRequest permission invoke on mainactivity shows warning as it supports only v23.0 and later #12764
  • Problem encountered on MAUI first app tutorial device Emulator setup. #12763
  • "dotnet build" complains about missing nuget packages #12762
  • Error when Printing through JS when using .NET Maui Blazor Hybrid #12761
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ScrollBarVisibility "Always" is not consistent. #12760

Closed

  • TodoREST Sample Project “HttpRequestException: The Internet connection appears to be offline.” “Local network prohibited” on iOS 16 #12731
  • Error en Shell Flyout #12587
    Backlog
  • build fails if xaml is in Platform/Windows folder #12306
  • Calling async method inside CreateMauiApp #12524
  • EXC_BAD_ACCESS (SIGKILL (Code Signature Invalid)) - App crashes when starting #12483
  • Unable to Build and Debug Android #12549
  • New Maui projects should only open the Overview Page in VS #12755
  • Measure not working correctly on Layouts with fixed size constraints #7531
    7.0-rc2
  • MAUI apps crash on launch on Windows after Visual Studio update - code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #12080
  • Difficult installation #12664
  • .NET MAUI GIVING ERRORS AFTER UPDATING FROM VS 2022 17.4.3 TO 17.4.4 #12681
  • App shell does not fill screen on iOS when no splash screen is added to project. #11951
  • Setting SetIsSmoothScrollEnabled to false on a TabbedPage causes blank pages after navigating. #7558
  • Entry ClearButton does not clear the text? #9954
    Backlog
  • Winforms process not stopping correctly when using WebView2 #7997
    8.0-preview1

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #12803
  • [net7.0] Add more logging for BlazorWebView (#12357) #12801
  • [net7.0] Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #12800
  • [net7.0] Process ContainerView through mapper and fix NeedsContainer logic #12799
  • [net7.0] Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #12798
  • Fix password placeholder font issue on Android #12792
    area/controls 🎮
  • Revert "Fix timing on iOS Toolbar (#12363)" #12788
  • [Windows] Fix crash disconnecting CollectionView #12774
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix issues invalidating the Background of some controls #12773
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #12768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Make MediaPicker capture methods work in Android 13+ #12766
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Merged

  • [net7.0] Modify generics on replaced mappers inside `Controls` to cover more types. #12785
  • Prevent mobile and lib templates from opening editors if in VS #12756
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] [Windows] Fix Slider crash using the same Minimum, Maximum value #12784
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Actions] Use the default github token. #12794
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12782
    area/controls 🎮
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials PhoneDialer API Docs #12781
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials VersionTracking API Docs #12787
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Compass API Docs #12780
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Vibration API Docs #12783
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Fix MenuFlyoutSubItemHandler to actually call MapIsEnabled #12789
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Map API Docs #12779
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Fixed a typo on the Display Info Width documentation #12778
  • Fix BlazorWebView WinForms deadlock when disposing #12656
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Removed SurveyPrompt from maui blazor template #12769
  • Stable branding for 7.0.1xx-sr3 #12775
  • Ensure iOS always has the required splash storyboard #12677
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12757
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update Essentials Share API Docs #12722
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Update SemanticScreenReader API Docs #12724
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Update to 6.0 SR10 version #12752
  • One more version ahead #12758
  • Dev/ios guid splash #12759
  • Use relative X position of tap when determining if the button was hit #12753

Updated

  • Simplification of interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Remove obsoleted OpenGLView #12579
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix Entry Next Keyboard Button Finds Next TextField #11914
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Retain the cursor position when transforming the text #12750
    area/controls 🎮
  • Ensure flyout detail updated on Android Tablet side-by-side layout on navigation push of 2nd page #12754
    community ✨
  • Changes how propagate brushes changes #12714
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • added monochrome element to the AdaptiveIconDrawableXml #12564
    community ✨
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Align Graphics APIs naming with the rest of the platforms #12578
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix initial page and back button Navigation events #12348
    area/navigation 🧭
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
